span.span: Represents one table of in-memory data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 ADO.NET 文件庫中的核心物件。The is a central object in the ADO.NET library. 其他物件使用包含和。Other objects that use the include the and the . 當存取物件，請注意，它們是有條件地區分大小寫。When accessing objects, note that they are conditionally case sensitive. 例如，如果一個名為"mydatatable"和另一個名為"Mydatatable 」，用來搜尋的其中一個資料表的字串會視為區分大小寫。For example, if one is named "mydatatable" and another is named "Mydatatable", a string used to search for one of the tables is regarded as case sensitive. 不過，如果"mydatatable 」 存在，"Mydatatable"並不會搜尋字串會視為為不區分大小寫。However, if "mydatatable" exists and "Mydatatable" does not, the search string is regarded as case insensitive. A可以包含兩個具有相同的物件屬性值，但不同屬性值。A can contain two objects that have the same property value but different property values. 如需有關使用物件，請參閱[建立 DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-datatable.md)。For more information about working with objects, see [Creating a DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-datatable.md). 如果您要建立以程式設計的方式，您必須先定義其結構描述加物件加入至(透過存取屬性)。If you are creating a programmatically, you must first define its schema by adding objects to the (accessed through the property). 如需有關加入物件，請參閱[新增資料行加入至 DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-columns-to-a-datatable.md)。For more information about adding objects, see [Adding Columns to a DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-columns-to-a-datatable.md). 若要將資料列加入，您必須先使用方法以傳回新物件。To add rows to a , you must first use the method to return a new object. 方法傳回的結構描述資料列，因為它由資料表的定義。The method returns a row with the schema of the , as it is defined by the table's . 最大數目的資料列可以存放區是 16,777,216。The maximum number of rows that a can store is 16,777,216. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[將資料加入至 DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-data-to-a-datatable.md)。For more information, see [Adding Data to a DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-data-to-a-datatable.md). 也包含一組物件，可以用來確保資料的完整性。The also contains a collection of objects that can be used to ensure the integrity of the data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[DataTable 條件約束](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatable-constraints.md)。For more information, see [DataTable Constraints](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatable-constraints.md). 有許多可用來判斷對資料表進行變更時的事件。There are many events that can be used to determine when changes are made to a table. 其中包括 、、 和 。These include , , , and . 如需有關可以搭配使用的事件，請參閱[處理 DataTable 的事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/handling-datatable-events.md)。For more information about the events that can be used with a , see [Handling DataTable Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/handling-datatable-events.md). 執行個體時建立時，某些屬性設為初始值的讀取/寫入。When an instance of is created, some of the read/write properties are set to initial values. 如需這些值的清單，請參閱建構函式的主題。For a list of these values, see the constructor topic. > [!NOTE] > 和物件繼承自，並支援適用於.NET Framework 遠端處理的介面。The and objects inherit from , and support the interface for .NET Framework remoting. 這些是唯一適用於.NET Framework 遠端處理，您可以使用的 ADO.NET 物件。These are the only ADO.NET objects that you can use for .NET Framework remoting. ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個物件和一個物件，並加入新的物件，以。The following example creates two objects and one object, and adds the new objects to a . 資料表會再顯示在控制項。The tables are then displayed in a control. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTable Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 這個範例示範如何手動建立 DataTable，使用特定的結構描述定義：This sample demonstrates how to create a DataTable manually with specific schema definitions: - 建立多個 Datatable 並定義初始的資料行。Create multiple DataTables and define the initial columns. - 建立資料表條件約束。Create the table constraints. - 插入值，並顯示資料表。Insert the values and display the tables. - 建立運算式資料行，並顯示資料表。Create the expression columns and display the tables. 此程式碼範例使用 C# 和 Visual Basic 專案可以找到上[開發人員程式碼範例](http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/How-to-create-DataTable-7abb4914)。C# and Visual Basic projects with this code sample can be found on [Developer Code Samples](http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/How-to-create-DataTable-7abb4914). remarks.format: ## Remarks A定義兩個資料表之間的關聯性。A defines the relationship between two tables. 一般而言，透過的單一欄位所包含相同的資料連結兩個資料表。Typically, two tables are linked through a single field that contains the same data. 例如，資料表，其中包含地址資料可能包含代表國家 （地區） 的程式碼的單一欄位。For example, a table which contains address data may have a single field containing codes that represent countries/regions. 包含國家/地區資料的第二個資料表會有的單一欄位所包含的程式碼識別國家/地區，而且這段程式碼插入至第一個資料表中的對應欄位。A second table that contains country/region data will have a single field that contains the code that identifies the country/region, and it is this code which is inserted into the corresponding field in the first table. A ，然後，包含至少四項資訊: (1) 的第一個資料表的名稱、 （2） 中的第一個資料表的資料行名稱、 （3） 的第二個資料表，名稱和 （4） 的第二個資料表中的資料行名稱。A , then, contains at least four pieces of information: (1) the name of the first table, (2) the column name in the first table, (3) the name of the second table, and (4) the column name in the second table. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來傳回每個子系中。The following example uses the property to return each child in a . 每個關聯性則做為引數用於方法傳回陣列的資料列。Each relation is then used as an argument in the method of the to return an array of rows. 接著會列印每個資料列中的資料行的值。The value of each column in the row is then printed. remarks.format: ## Remarks `expression`參數需要的彙總函式。The `expression` parameter requires an aggregate function. 例如，以下是合法的運算式：For example, the following is a legal expression: `Count(Quantity)` 但是，此運算式不是：But this expression is not: `Sum (Quantity * UnitPrice)` 如果您必須執行兩個或多個資料行上的作業，您應該建立，將其屬性設為適當的運算式，並使用產生的資料行上的彙總運算式。If you must perform an operation on two or more columns, you should create a , set its property to an appropriate expression, and use an aggregate expression on the resulting column. 在此情況下，給定具有名稱"總計 」，而屬性設定為這個：In that case, given a with the name "total", and the property set to this: `"Quantity * UnitPrice"` 運算式引數方法將會是這樣：The expression argument for the method would then be this: `Sum(total)` 第二個參數， `filter`，判斷哪些資料列會在運算式中使用。The second parameter, `filter`, determines which rows are used in the expression. 例如，如果資料表包含名為"colDate 」 的日期資料行，您可能會限制使用下列運算式的資料列：For example, if the table contains a date column named "colDate", you could limit the rows with the following expression: `colDate > 1/1/99 AND colDate < 17/1/99` 如需建立兩個參數的運算式的規則，請參閱屬性。For rules on creating expressions for both parameters, see the property. ## Examples 下列範例會加總稱為 「 總計 」，其識別碼是五個銷售人員的資料行的值。The following example sums the values of a column named "Total", for the salesperson whose identification number is five. remarks.format: ## Remarks A限制資料行 （或資料行） 中的值已刪除或更新時執行的動作。A restricts the action performed when a value in a column (or columns) is either deleted or updated. 這類條件約束被用來搭配主索引鍵資料行。Such a constraint is intended to be used with primary key columns. 在兩個資料表之間的父子式關聯性，從父資料表中刪除某個值可能會影響子資料列以下列方式之一。In a parent/child relationship between two tables, deleting a value from the parent table can affect the child rows in one of the following ways. - 子資料列也可以刪除 （串聯式動作）。The child rows can also be deleted (a cascading action). - 子資料行 （或資料行） 中的值可以設為 null 值。The values in the child column (or columns) can be set to null values. - 子資料行 （或資料行） 中的值可以設定為預設值。The values in the child column (or columns) can be set to default values. - 可以產生例外狀況。An exception can be generated. A時嘗試設定中的非唯一值的主索引鍵的值會變成作用中。A becomes active when attempting to set a value in a primary key to a non-unique value. ## Examples 下列範例會將至條件約束的集合。The following example adds a to the collection of constraints. remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫加入資料列，以使用現有的資料表結構描述的資料表，但使用預設值的資料列，並設定至`Detached`。Calling adds a row to the table using the existing table schema, but with default values for the row, and sets the to `Detached`. 呼叫會保留現有以及其他資料列中的值。Calling preserves the existing along with other values in the row. 如果`DataRow`傳遞參數處於已卸離狀態，則會忽略它，並不擲回任何例外狀況。If the `DataRow` that is passed as a parameter is in a detached state, it is ignored, and no exception is thrown. 新的資料列會加入至資料表的結尾。The new row will be added to the end of the data table. 如果新的資料列違反條件約束不會加入到資料表。If the new row violates a Constraint it won’t be added to the data table. 您可以取得 DataTable.Rows.IndexOf DataTable.Rows.Find 以及新的資料列索引。You can get the index of the new row with as DataTable.Rows.Find and DataTable.Rows.IndexOf. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 和 。See and for more information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Load`方法可以用數種常見案例，所有中心從指定的資料來源取得資料，並將它加入至目前的資料容器中 (在此情況下， `DataTable`)。The `Load` method can be used in several common scenarios, all centered around getting data from a specified data source and adding it to the current data container (in this case, a `DataTable`). 下列案例說明標準用法`DataTable`，描述其更新，以及合併行為。These scenarios describe standard usage for a `DataTable`, describing its update and merge behavior. A`DataTable`同步處理或單一主要資料來源的更新。A `DataTable` synchronizes or updates with a single primary data source. `DataTable`追蹤變更，允許與主要資料來源的同步處理。The `DataTable` tracks changes, allowing synchronization with the primary data source. 此外，`DataTable`可以接受一或多個次要資料來源的增量資料。In addition, a `DataTable` can accept incremental data from one or more secondary data sources. `DataTable`不負責追蹤變更，才能允許與次要資料來源的同步處理。The `DataTable` isn't responsible for tracking changes in order to allow synchronization with the secondary data source. 指定這些兩個假設性的資料來源，使用者很可能需要下列行為的其中一個：Given these two hypothetical data sources, a user is likely to require one of the following behaviors: - 初始化`DataTable`從主要資料來源。Initialize `DataTable` from a primary data source. 在此案例中，使用者想要初始化空`DataTable`與主要資料來源中的值。In this scenario, the user wants to initialize an empty `DataTable` with values from the primary data source. 稍後，使用者想要將變更傳送回主要資料來源。Later the user intends to propagate changes back to the primary data source. - 保留變更，並重新同步處理主要資料來源。Preserve changes and re-synchronize from the primary data source. 在此案例中，使用者想要採取`DataTable`區域分布在前述案例中，執行增量同步處理與主要資料來源，保留中所做的修改`DataTable`。In this scenario, the user wants to take the `DataTable` filled in the previous scenario and perform an incremental synchronization with the primary data source, preserving modifications made in the `DataTable`. - 累加式的資料摘要，從次要資料來源。Incremental data feed from secondary data sources. 在此案例中，使用者想要合併一或多個次要資料來源的變更，並將變更傳播回到主要資料來源。In this scenario, the user wants to merge changes from one or more secondary data sources, and propagate those changes back to the primary data source. `Load`方法可讓所有這些情況。The `Load` method makes all these scenarios possible. 所有多載這個方法可讓您指定的負載選項參數，表示方式已在資料列結合正在載入的資料列。All but one of the overloads for this method allows you to specify a load option parameter, indicating how rows already in a combine with rows being loaded. （不允許您指定的行為的多載會使用預設載入選項）。下表描述所提供的三種負載選項列舉型別。(The overload that doesn't allow you to specify the behavior uses the default load option.) The following table describes the three load options provided by the enumeration. 在每個案例中，說明當內送資料中的資料列的主索引鍵符合現有的資料列的主索引鍵表示的行為。In each case, the description indicates the behavior when the primary key of a row in the incoming data matches the primary key of an existing row. |載入選項Load Option|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`PreserveChanges` (預設值)`PreserveChanges` (default)|內送資料列的值，更新資料列的原始版本。Updates the original version of the row with the value of the incoming row.| |`OverwriteChanges`|使用內送資料列的值更新資料列的目前和原始版本。Updates the current and original versions of the row with the value of the incoming row.| |`Upsert`|內送資料列的值，更新資料列的目前版本。Updates the current version of the row with the value of the incoming row.| 一般情況下，`PreserveChanges`和`OverwriteChanges`選項適用於使用者要同步處理的案例`DataSet`及它的主要資料來源的變更。In general, the `PreserveChanges` and `OverwriteChanges` options are intended for scenarios in which the user needs to synchronize the `DataSet` and its changes with the primary data source. `Upsert`選項可以協助彙總一或多個次要資料來源的變更。The `Upsert` option facilitates aggregating changes from one or more secondary data sources. ## Examples 下列範例會示範數個呼叫的相關問題的方法。The following example demonstrates several of the issues involved with calling the method. 首先，此範例著重於結構描述問題，包括 推斷的結構描述從載入，和不相容的結構描述和結構描述具有遺失或其他資料行，接著處理。First, the example focuses on schema issues, including inferring a schema from the loaded , and then handling incompatible schemas, and schemas with missing or additional columns. 此範例接著著重於資料問題，包括處理各種載入選項。The example then focuses on data issues, including handling the various loading options. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例示範如何使用其中一個多載版本`Load`。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of `Load`. 如需可能會提供其他範例，請參閱個別的多載的主題。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTableLoad#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableLoad/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTableLoad#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableLoad/VB/source.vb#1)]

## Remarks 方法會使用第一個結果集從載入，並成功完成之後，讀取器的位置設下一個結果集，如果有的話。The method consumes the first result set from the loaded , and after successful completion, sets the reader's position to the next result set, if any. 轉換資料時`Load`方法會使用相同的轉換規則方法。When converting data, the `Load` method uses the same conversion rules as the method. 方法必須考慮到三個特定的問題時載入的資料從執行個體： 結構描述、 資料和事件的作業。The method must take into account three specific issues when loading the data from an instance: schema, data, and event operations. 當使用結構描述，方法可能會遇到的條件下, 表中所述。When working with the schema, the method may encounter conditions as described in the following table. 結構描述作業進行的所有匯入的結果集，即使沒有包含資料。The schema operations take place for all imported result sets, even those containing no data. |條件Condition|行為Behavior| |---------------|--------------| |沒有結構描述。The has no schema.|方法會根據來自匯入的結果集的結構描述。The method infers the schema based on the result set from the imported .| |有結構描述，但它與載入結構描述不相容。The has a schema, but it is incompatible with the loaded schema.|方法會擲回對應至特定錯誤的嘗試將資料載入至不相容的結構描述時，就會發生例外狀況。The method throws an exception corresponding to the particular error that occurs when attempting to load data into the incompatible schema.| |結構描述相容，但已載入的結果集結構描述包含資料行不存在於。The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains columns that do not exist in the .|方法加入額外的資料行，以`DataTable`的結構描述。The method adds the extra columns to `DataTable`'s schema. 在方法擲回例外狀況，如果對應中的資料行和載入的結果集不相容的值。The method throws an exception if corresponding columns in the and the loaded result set are not value compatible. 方法也會擷取結果集和所有加入的資料行的條件約束資訊。The method also retrieves constraint information from the result set for all added columns. 此條件約束資訊的主索引鍵條件約束的情況下，除了用只有當目前不包含任何資料行，在載入作業的開頭。Except for the case of Primary Key constraint, this constraint information is used only if the current does not contain any columns at the start of the load operation.| |結構描述相容，但載入的結果集結構描述包含較少的資料行，比`DataTable`。The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains fewer columns than does the `DataTable`.|如果遺漏資料行已定義了預設值或資料行的資料類型可為 null，方法可讓資料列来加入，以取代預設值或`null`遺漏資料行的值。If a missing column has a default value defined or the column's data type is nullable, the method allows the rows to be added, substituting the default or `null` value for the missing column. 如果沒有預設值或`null`可用，然後在`Load`方法會擲回的例外狀況。If no default value or `null` can be used, then the `Load` method throws an exception. 如果未不提供任何特定的預設值，`Load`方法會使用`null`值設為隱含的預設值。If no specific default value has been supplied, the `Load` method uses the `null` value as the implied default value.| 考慮的行為之前，先`Load`方法資料作業，請考慮每個資料列內會維護目前值和每個資料行的原始值。Before considering the behavior of the `Load` method in terms of data operations, consider that each row within a maintains both the current value and the original value for each column. 這些值可能會相等，或如果已變更過填滿的資料列中的資料可能會不同`DataTable`。These values may be equivalent, or may be different if the data in the row has been changed since filling the `DataTable`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料列狀態和資料列版本](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md)。For more information, see [Row States and Row Versions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md). 這個版本的`Load`方法會嘗試保留每個資料列，並完整留下的原始值中的目前值。This version of the `Load` method attempts to preserve the current values in each row, leaving the original value intact. (如果您想更細微地控制行為的內送資料，請參閱。)如果現有的資料列和內送資料列包含對應的主索引鍵值，則會使用目前的資料列狀態值處理的資料列，否則它會被視為新的資料列。(If you want finer control over the behavior of incoming data, see .) If the existing row and the incoming row contain corresponding primary key values, the row is processed using its current row state value, otherwise it's treated as a new row. 事件作業之前變更每個資料列時，就會發生事件和變更每個資料列之後，就會發生事件。In terms of event operations, the event occurs before each row is changed, and the event occurs after each row has been changed. 在每個案例中，屬性傳遞至事件處理常式的執行個體包含與事件相關聯的特定動作的相關資訊。In each case, the property of the instance passed to the event handler contains information about the particular action associated with the event. 此動作的值而定的資料列之前載入作業的狀態。This action value depends on the state of the row before the load operation. 在每個案例中，這兩個事件發生，而且動作是針對每個相同。In each case, both events occur, and the action is the same for each. 此動作可套用到每個資料列，目前或原始版本或兩者，根據目前的資料列狀態。The action may be applied to either the current or original version of each row, or both, depending on the current row state. 下表顯示行為`Load`方法。The following table displays behavior for the `Load` method. （標示為"（不會出現） 」） 的最後一個資料列描述不符合任何現有的資料列的內送資料列的行為。The final row (labeled "(Not present)") describes the behavior for incoming rows that don't match any existing row. 此資料表中的每個資料格會描述資料列中欄位的目前和原始值連同後的值為`Load`方法已完成。Each cell in this table describes the current and original value for a field within a row, along with the for the value after the `Load` method has completed. 方法在此情況下，不允許您指定 [載入] 選項，並使用預設值， `PreserveChanges`。In this case, the method doesn't allow you to indicate the load option, and uses the default, `PreserveChanges`. |現有 GetchangesExisting DataRowState|值之後`Load`方法和事件動作Values after `Load` method, and event action| |---------------------------|--------------------------------------------------| |已加入Added|目前 =\<現有 >Current = \

## Remarks `Load`方法會使用第一個結果集從載入，並成功完成之後，讀取器的位置設下一個結果集，如果有的話。The `Load` method consumes the first result set from the loaded , and after successful completion, sets the reader's position to the next result set, if any. 轉換資料時`Load`方法會使用相同的轉換規則方法。When converting data, the `Load` method uses the same conversion rules as the method. `Load`方法必須考慮到三個特定的問題時載入的資料從執行個體： 結構描述、 資料和事件的作業。The `Load` method must take into account three specific issues when loading the data from an instance: schema, data, and event operations. 當使用結構描述，`Load`方法可能會遇到的條件下, 表中所述。When working with the schema, the `Load` method may encounter conditions as described in the following table. 結構描述作業進行的所有匯入的結果集，即使沒有包含資料。The schema operations take place for all imported result sets, even those containing no data. |條件Condition|行為Behavior| |---------------|--------------| |沒有結構描述。The has no schema.|`Load`方法會根據來自匯入的結果集的結構描述。The `Load` method infers the schema based on the result set from the imported .| |有結構描述，但它與載入結構描述不相容。The has a schema, but it is incompatible with the loaded schema.|`Load`方法會擲回對應至特定錯誤的嘗試將資料載入至不相容的結構描述時，就會發生例外狀況。The `Load` method throws an exception corresponding to the particular error that occurs when attempting to load data into the incompatible schema.| |結構描述相容，但已載入的結果集結構描述包含資料行不存在於中`DataTable`。The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains columns that don't exist in the `DataTable`.|`Load`方法會將額外的資料行至`DataTable`的結構描述。The `Load` method adds the extra column(s) to `DataTable`’s schema. 在方法擲回例外狀況，如果對應中的資料行和載入的結果集不相容的值。The method throws an exception if corresponding columns in the and the loaded result set are not value compatible. 方法也會擷取結果集和所有加入的資料行的條件約束資訊。The method also retrieves constraint information from the result set for all added columns. 此條件約束資訊的主索引鍵條件約束的情況下，除了用只有當目前不包含任何資料行，在載入作業的開頭。Except for the case of Primary Key constraint, this constraint information is used only if the current does not contain any columns at the start of the load operation.| |結構描述相容，但載入的結果集結構描述包含較少的資料行，比`DataTable`。The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains fewer columns than does the `DataTable`.|如果遺漏資料行已定義了預設值或資料行的資料類型可為 null，`Load`方法可讓資料列来加入，以取代遺失的資料行的預設值或 null 值。If a missing column has a default value defined or the column's data type is nullable, the `Load` method allows the rows to be added, substituting the default or null value for the missing column. 如果可以使用沒有預設值或 null，則`Load`方法會擲回的例外狀況。If no default value or null can be used, then the `Load` method throws an exception. 如果未不提供任何特定的預設值，`Load`方法會使用隱含的預設值為 null 的值。If no specific default value has been supplied, the `Load` method uses the null value as the implied default value.| 考慮的行為之前，先`Load`方法資料作業，請考慮每個資料列內會維護目前值和每個資料行的原始值。Before considering the behavior of the `Load` method in terms of data operations, consider that each row within a maintains both the current value and the original value for each column. 這些值可能會相等，或如果已變更過填滿的資料列中的資料可能會不同`DataTable`。These values may be equivalent, or may be different if the data in the row has been changed since filling the `DataTable`. 請參閱[資料列狀態和資料列版本](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Row States and Row Versions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md) for more information. 在這個方法呼叫中，指定參數會影響連入資料的處理。In this method call, the specified parameter influences the processing of the incoming data. `DataTable`, and then perhaps propagate the data back to the primary data source. 參數用來判斷要用於主索引鍵比較的資料列的特定版本。The parameter is used for determining the specific version of the row that is to be used for primary key comparison. 下表提供詳細資料。The table below provides the details. |載入選項Load option|用於主索引鍵比較的 DataRow 版本DataRow version used for primary key comparison| |-----------------|-----------------------------------------------------| |`OverwriteChanges`|原始版本 （如果存在的話），否則目前的版本Original version, if it exists, otherwise Current version| |`PreserveChanges`|原始版本 （如果存在的話），否則目前的版本Original version, if it exists, otherwise Current version| |`Upsert`|目前版本 （如果存在的話），否則原始版本Current version, if it exists, otherwise Original version| `errorHandler`參數是載入資料時，發生錯誤時呼叫的程序是指的委派。The `errorHandler` parameter is a delegate that refers to a procedure that is called when an error occurs while loading data. 參數傳遞至程序提供可讓您擷取發生的錯誤，目前的資料，資料列的相關資訊的屬性和被填入。The parameter passed to the procedure provides properties that allow you to retrieve information about the error that occurred, the current row of data, and the being filled. 使用此委派機制，而不是簡單的 try/catch 區塊，可讓您判斷錯誤處理狀況，並繼續處理，如果您想。Using this delegate mechanism, rather than a simpler try/catch block, allows you to determine the error, handle the situation, and continue processing if you like. 參數提供屬性： 將此屬性設定為`true`指出您已處理錯誤，而且想要繼續處理。The parameter supplies a property: set this property to `true` to indicate that you have handled the error and wish to continue processing. 將屬性設定為`false`指出您想要停止處理。Set the property to `false` to indicate that you wish to halt processing. 請注意，將屬性設`false`導致觸發要擲回例外狀況的問題將程式碼。Be aware that setting the property to `false` causes the code that triggered the problem to throw an exception. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTableLoad.ErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableLoad.ErrorEventHandler/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTableLoad.ErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableLoad.ErrorEventHandler/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會採用值的陣列，並在主索引鍵資料行中尋找相符的值。The method takes an array of values and finds the matching value(s) in the primary key column(s). 如果資料行有預設值，傳遞 null 值的陣列中要設定該資料行的預設值。If a column has a default value, pass a null value in the array to set the default value for that column. 同樣地，如果資料行其屬性設為 true，則傳遞 null 值的陣列中要設定自動產生資料列的值。Similarly, if a column has its property set to true, pass a null value in the array to set the automatically generated value for the row. 如果`fAcceptChanges`參數是`true`或未指定，會加入新的資料，然後呼叫可接受中的所有變更; 如果引數是`false`，新加入的資料列標示為插入，而且會變更現有的資料列都會標示為修改。If the `fAcceptChanges` parameter is `true` or not specified, the new data is added and then is called to accept all changes in the ; if the argument is `false`, newly added rows are marked as insertions, and changes to existing rows are marked as modifications. 例外狀況，也會發生在其中或事件。Exceptions can also occur during either a or event. 如果發生例外狀況，資料列不會加入至資料表。If an exception occurs, the row is not added to the table. 使用搭配和。Use in conjunction with and . ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以嘗試尋找一個資料列。The following example uses the method to attempt to find a row. 如果找到這類的資料列，這些值可用來建立新的資料列。If no such row is found, the values are used to create a new row. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTable.LoadDataRow Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTable.LoadDataRow Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTable.LoadDataRow Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTable.LoadDataRow Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Merge`方法用來合併兩個有大致相似的結構描述的物件。The `Merge` method is used to merge two objects that have largely similar schemas. 合併用戶端應用程式上通常用來將資料來源的最新的變更合併至現有。A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing . 這可讓用戶端應用程式已重新整理從資料來源的最新的資料。This allows the client application to have a refreshed with the latest data from the data source. 「 合併 」 作業會列入考量，只有原始資料表，以及要合併的資料表。The merge operation takes into account only the original table, and the table to be merged. 未受影響或包含子資料表。Child tables are not affected or included. 如果資料表有一或多個定義為關聯性，一部分的子資料表必須個別合併每一個子資料表。If a table has one or more child tables, defined as part of a relationship, each child table must be merged individually. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式示範的行為`missingSchemaAction`參數方法。The following console application demonstrates the behavior of the `missingSchemaAction` parameter of the method. 這個範例會建立兩個版本的相同資料表中，修改第二個版本的結構描述。This example creates two versions of the same table, modifying the schema for the second version. 程式碼會嘗試將第二個資料表合併到第一個。The code then attempts to merge the second table into the first. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例示範如何使用其中一種多載版本的合併。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of Merge. 如需可能會提供其他範例，請參閱個別的多載的主題。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTableMergeOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableMergeOverload/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTableMergeOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableMergeOverload/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Merge 方法用來合併兩個有大致相似的結構描述的物件。The Merge method is used to merge two objects that have largely similar schemas. 合併用戶端應用程式上通常用來將資料來源的最新的變更合併至現有。A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing . 這可讓用戶端應用程式已重新整理從資料來源的最新的資料。This allows the client application to have a refreshed with the latest data from the data source. 「 合併 」 作業會列入考量，只有原始資料表，以及要合併的資料表。The merge operation takes into account only the original table, and the table to be merged. 未受影響或包含子資料表。Child tables are not affected or included. 如果資料表有一或多個定義為關聯性，一部分的子資料表必須個別合併每一個子資料表。If a table has one or more child tables, defined as part of a relationship, each child table must be merged individually. `Merge`方法通常稱為結尾的一系列程序牽涉到驗證的變更、 重新調整錯誤、 變更，更新資料來源和最後重新整理現有。The `Merge` method is typically called at the end of a series of procedures that involve validating changes, reconciling errors, updating the data source with the changes, and finally refreshing the existing . 當執行合併，現有的資料，在合併之前所做的變更會保留依預設，合併作業期間。When performing a merge, changes made to the existing data before the merge are preserved by default during the merge operation. 開發人員可以呼叫其中一個其他兩個多載，此方法，並指定 false 值，以修改此行為`preserveChanges`參數。Developers can modify this behavior by calling one of the other two overloads for this method, and specifying a false value for the `preserveChanges` parameter. 在用戶端應用程式，則通常會有單一按鈕，讓使用者可以按一下收集變更的資料，再將它傳送回中介層元件進行驗證。In a client application, it is usual to have a single button that the user can click that gathers the changed data and validates it before sending it back to a middle tier component. 在此案例中，首次叫用方法。In this scenario, the method is first invoked. 方法會傳回第二個適合用來驗證和合併。That method returns a second optimized for validating and merging. 此第二個物件只包含物件已變更，導致原始子集。This second object contains only the objects that were changed, resulting in a subset of the original . 這個子集通常比較小，因此更有效率地傳遞回中介層元件。This subset is generally smaller and thus more efficiently passed back to a middle tier component. 然後中, 介層元件會透過預存程序，以變更更新原始資料來源。The middle tier component then updates the original data source with the changes through stored procedures. 中介層就可以傳送回其中一個新（藉由執行原始查詢一次），包含原始資料和資料來源的最新的資料，或可重新傳送的任何變更，已對它從資料來源子集。The middle tier can then send back either a new that includes original data and the latest data from the data source (by running the original query again), or it can send back the subset with any changes that have been made to it from the data source. （例如，如果資料來源會自動建立唯一的主索引鍵值，這些值可以傳播回用戶端應用程式。）在任一情況下，傳回可以合併至用戶端應用程式的原始與方法。(For example, if the data source automatically creates unique primary key values, these values can be propagated back to the client application.) In either case, the returned can be merged back into the client application's original with the method. 合併新的來源時到目標，任何來源的資料列與值`Unchanged`， `Modified`，或`Deleted`，對應到相同的主索引鍵值的目標資料列。When merging a new source into the target, any source rows with a value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted`, is matched to target rows with the same primary key values. 來源的資料列值`Added`會對應到新的目標資料列與相同的主索引鍵值為新的來源資料列。Source rows with a value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式會建立簡單並且將資料加入至資料表。The following console application creates a simple and adds data to the table. 接著，範例會建立一份資料表，並加入資料列的複本。The example then creates a copy of the table, adding rows to the copy. 最後，此範例會呼叫方法，將合併的第二個資料表中的資料，第一個資料表中的資料。Finally, the example calls the method to merge the data in the second table with the data in the first table. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTable.Merge#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.Merge/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTable.Merge#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.Merge/VB/source.vb#1)]

the merge operation unless the developer specifies false for the `preserveChanges` parameter. 如果`preserveChanges`參數設定為`true`，內送值不會覆寫現有的資料列的目前資料列版本中現有的值。If the `preserveChanges` parameter is set to Versions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md). 在用戶端應用程式，則通常會有單一按鈕，讓使用者可以按一下收集變更的資料，再將它傳送回中介層元件進行驗證。In a client application, it is usual to have a tier component then updates the original data source with the changes through stored procedures. 中介層就可以傳送回其中一個新（藉由執行原始查詢一次），包含原始資料和資料來源的最新的資料，或可重新傳送的任何變更，已對它從資料來源子集。The middle tier can then send back either a new that includes original data and the latest data from the data source (by running the original query again), or it can send back the subset with any changes that have been made to it from the data source. （例如，如果資料來源會自動建立唯一的主索引鍵值，這些值可以傳播回用戶端應用程式。）在任一情況下，傳回可以合併至用戶端應用程式的原始與方法。(For example, if the data source automatically creates unique primary key values, these values can be propagated back to the client application.) In either case, the returned can be merged back into the client application's original with the method. 合併新的來源時到目標，任何來源的資料列與值`Unchanged`， `Modified`，或`Deleted`會對應到相同的主索引鍵值的目標資料列。When merging a new source into the target, any source rows with a value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted` are matched to target rows with the same primary key values. 來源的資料列值`Added`會對應到新的目標資料列與相同的主索引鍵值為新的來源資料列。Source rows with a value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式建立包含資料列，修改這些資料列中的資料部分，並嘗試從不同的資料合併。The following console application creates a containing rows, modifies some of the data in those rows, and attempts to merge data from a different . 此範例示範不同的行為，如`preserveChanges`參數。The example demonstrates the different behaviors for the `preserveChanges` parameter. remarks.format: ## Remarks `Merge`方法用來合併兩個有大致相似的結構描述的物件。The `Merge` method is used to merge two objects that have largely similar schemas. 合併用戶端應用程式上通常用來將資料來源的最新的變更合併至現有。A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing . 這可讓用戶端應用程式已重新整理從資料來源的最新的資料。This allows the client application to have a refreshed with the latest data from the data source. 「 合併 」 作業會列入考量，只有原始資料表，以及要合併的資料表。The merge operation takes into account only the original table, and the table to be merged. 未受影響或包含子資料表。Child tables are not affected or included. 如果資料表有一或多個定義為關聯性，一部分的子資料表必須個別合併每一個子資料表。If a table has one or more child tables, defined as part of a relationship, each child table must be merged individually. `Merge`方法通常稱為結尾的一系列程序牽涉到驗證的變更、 重新調整錯誤、 變更，更新資料來源和最後重新整理現有。The `Merge` method is typically called at the end of a series of procedures that involve validating changes, reconciling errors, updating the data source with the changes, and finally refreshing the existing . 除非開發人員會指定為 false 時執行合併，現有的資料，在合併之前所做的變更會保留在合併作業期間`preserveChanges`參數。When performing a merge, changes made to the existing data before the merge are preserved during the merge operation unless the developer specifies false for the `preserveChanges` parameter. 如果`preserveChanges`參數設定為`true`，內送值不會覆寫現有的資料列的目前資料列版本中現有的值。If the `preserveChanges` parameter is set to `true`, incoming values do not overwrite existing values in the Current row version of the existing row. 如果`preserveChanges`參數設定為`false`，內送值就會覆寫現有的資料列的目前資料列版本中現有的值。If the `preserveChanges` parameter is set to `false`, incoming values do overwrite the existing values in the Current row version of the existing row. 如需詳細資料列版本的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料列狀態和資料列版本](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md)。For more information about row versions, see [Row States and Row Versions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md). 在用戶端應用程式，則通常會有單一按鈕，讓使用者可以按一下收集變更的資料，再將它傳送回中介層元件進行驗證。In a client application, it is usual to have a single button that the user can click that gathers the changed data and validates it before sending it back to a middle tier component. 在此案例中，首次叫用方法。In this scenario, the method is first invoked. 方法會傳回第二個適合用來驗證和合併。That method returns a second optimized for validating and merging. 此第二個物件只包含和物件已變更，導致原始子集。This second object contains only the and objects that were changed, resulting in a subset of the original . 這個子集是容量較小時，因此這個子集更有效率地傳遞回中介層元件。This subset is generally smaller, and thus this subset is more efficiently passed back to a middle tier component. 然後中, 介層元件會透過預存程序，以變更更新原始資料來源。The middle tier component then updates the original data source with the changes through stored procedures. 中介層就可以傳送回其中一個新（藉由執行原始查詢一次），包含原始資料和資料來源的最新的資料，或可重新傳送的任何變更，已對它從資料來源子集。The middle tier can then send back either a new that includes original data and the latest data from the data source (by running the original query again), or it can send back the subset with any changes that have been made to it from the data source. （例如，如果資料來源會自動建立唯一的主索引鍵值，這些值可以傳播回用戶端應用程式。）在任一情況下，傳回可以合併至用戶端應用程式的原始與方法。(For example, if the data source automatically creates unique primary key values, these values can be propagated back to the client application.) In either case, the returned can be merged back into the client application's original with the method. 當呼叫方法時，兩個結構描述物件進行比較，因為它是可能的結構描述可能已經變更。When the method is called, the schemas of the two objects are compared, because it is possible that the schemas may have been changed. 例如，在企業對企業案例中，新的資料行可能已新增至 XML 結構描述自動化程序。For example, in a business-to-business scenario, new columns may have been added to an XML schema by an automated process. 如果來源包含結構描述項目 (加入物件) 中遺失目標中，結構描述項目可以藉由設定新增至目標`missingSchemaAction`引數`MissingSchemaAction.Add`。If the source contains schema elements (added objects) that are missing in the target, the schema elements can be added to the target by setting the `missingSchemaAction` argument to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`. 在此情況下，合併包含新增結構描述和資料。In that case, the merged contains the added schema and data. 合併結構描述後, 資料會合併。After merging schemas, the data is merged. 合併新的來源時到目標，任何來源的資料列與值`Unchanged`， `Modified`，或`Deleted`會對應到相同的主索引鍵值的目標資料列。When merging a new source into the target, any source rows with a value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted` are matched to target rows with the same primary key values. 來源的資料列值`Added`會對應到新的目標資料列與相同的主索引鍵值為新的來源資料列。Source rows with a value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式示範的行為`missingSchemaAction`參數方法。The following console application demonstrates the behavior of the `missingSchemaAction` parameter of the method. 這個範例會建立兩個版本的相同資料表中，修改第二個版本的結構描述。This example creates two versions of the same table, modifying the schema for the second version. 程式碼會嘗試將第二個資料表合併到第一個。The code then attempts to merge the second table into the first. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTable.MergeMissingSchemaAction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.MergeMissingSchemaAction/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTable.MergeMissingSchemaAction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.MergeMissingSchemaAction/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料表的主索引鍵必須是唯一識別資料表中的記錄。The primary key of a table must be unique to identify the record in the table. 它也可具有兩個或多個資料行所組成的主索引鍵的資料表。It's also possible to have a table with a primary key made up of two or more columns. 這發生在單一資料行不能包含足夠的唯一值。This occurs when a single column can't contain enough unique values. 例如，"FirstName"和"LastName"的資料行可能包含兩個資料行主索引鍵。For example, a two column primary key might consist of a "FirstName" and "LastName" column. 主索引鍵可以組成的多個資料行，因為屬性所組成的陣列物件。Because primary keys can be made up of more than one column, the property consists of an array of objects. ## Examples 第一個範例示範如何傳回主要索引鍵資料行中顯示`DataGrid`。The first example shows how to return the primary key columns for a displayed in a `DataGrid`. 第二個範例示範如何設定的主索引鍵資料行。The second example demonstrates how to set the primary key columns for a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法來讀取資料，或同時提供資料和結構描述從 XML 文件，而方法讀取的結構描述。The method provides a way to read either data only, or both data and schema into a from an XML document, whereas the method reads only the schema. 若要讀取資料和結構描述，請使用其中一種`ReadXML`包含的多載`XmlReadMode`參數，並將其值設定為`ReadSchema`。To read both data and schema, use one of the `ReadXML` overloads that include the `XmlReadMode` parameter, and set its value to `ReadSchema`. 請注意，也適用於和方法，分別。Note that the same is true for the and methods, respectively. 要寫入的 XML 資料，或結構描述和資料從`DataTable`，使用`WriteXml`方法。To write XML data, or both schema and data from the `DataTable`, use the `WriteXml` method. 若要寫入的結構描述，使用`WriteXmlSchema`方法。To write just the schema, use the `WriteXmlSchema` method. > [!NOTE] > 會擲回的資料行類型`DataRow`正在讀取或寫入實作，但未實作。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前以及使用所提供的資料載入其下階。The current and its descendents are loaded with the data from the supplied . 這個方法的行為是相同的方法，但也在此情況下，資料已載入僅適用於目前的資料表和子系。The behavior of this method is identical to that of the method, except that in this case, data is loaded only for the current table and its descendants. 方法來讀取資料，或同時提供資料和結構描述從 XML 文件，而方法讀取的結構描述。The method provides a way to read either data only, or both data and schema into a from an XML document, whereas the method reads only the schema. 請注意，也適用於和方法，分別。Note that the same is true for the and methods, respectively. 要寫入的 XML 資料，或結構描述和資料從`DataTable`，使用`WriteXml`方法。To write XML data, or both schema and data from the `DataTable`, use the `WriteXml` method. 若要寫入的結構描述，使用`WriteXmlSchema`方法。To write just the schema, use the `WriteXmlSchema` method. > [!NOTE] > 會擲回的資料行類型`DataRow`正在讀取或寫入實作，但未實作。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement . 如果指定的內嵌結構描述，則內嵌結構描述用來擴充現有的關聯式結構之前載入的資料。If an in-line schema is specified, the in-line schema is used to extend the existing relational structure prior to loading the data. 如果有任何衝突 （例如，相同的資料行定義為不同的資料型別相同資料表中） 會引發例外狀況。If there are any conflicts (for example, the same column in the same table defined with different data types) an exception is raised. 如果未不指定任何內嵌結構描述，就會推斷，視需要透過關聯式結構擴充根據 XML 文件的結構。If no in-line schema is specified, the relational structure is extended through inference, as necessary, according to the structure of the XML document. 如果無法透過推斷延伸架構才能公開的所有資料，會引發例外狀況。If the schema cannot be extended through inference in order to expose all data, an exception is raised. > [!NOTE] > `DataSet`不將 XML 項目關聯與其對應`DataColumn`或`DataTable`合法的 XML 字元，例如 ("_") 在序列化 xml 逸出。The `DataSet` does not associate an XML element with its corresponding `DataColumn` or `DataTable` when legal XML characters like ("_") are escaped in the serialized XML. `DataSet`本身只逸出 XML 項目名稱中不合法的 XML 字元，並因此可以只使用相同。The `DataSet` itself only escapes illegal XML characters in XML element names and hence can only consume the same. 當 XML 項目名稱中的合法字元會逸出時，處理時忽略此元素。When legal characters in XML element name are escaped, the element is ignored while processing. ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含兩個資料行和十個資料列。The following example creates a containing two columns and ten rows. 此範例寫入結構描述和資料至記憶體資料流，藉由叫用方法。The example writes the schema and data to a memory stream, by invoking the method. 此範例會建立第二個呼叫来填入結構描述和資料的方法。The example creates a second and calls the method to fill it with schema and data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法建立的結構描述。Use the method to create the schema for a . 結構描述包含資料表、 關聯和條件約束的定義。The schema includes table, relation, and constraint definitions. 若要寫入的 XML 文件結構描述，請使用方法。To write a schema to an XML document, use the method. XML 結構描述會根據標準的 XSD 進行解譯。The XML schema is interpreted according to the XSD standard. 如果 msdata:DataType 和 xs: type 類型不相符，就會發生資料損毀。Data corruption can occur if the msdata:DataType and the xs:type types do not match. 將會擲不回任何例外狀況。No exception will be thrown. `ReadXmlSchema`方法一般叫用之前叫用方法用來填滿。The `ReadXmlSchema` method is generally invoked before invoking the method which is used to fill the . 若要建立巢狀的關聯使用 XML 結構描述，請使用隱含的巢狀項目。To create a nested relation using XML schema, use implicit nested elements. 您也可以設定要使用明確的資料行名稱的巢狀的關聯。You can also configure the nested relation to use explicit column names. 必須在對應的 Datatable 加入巢狀關聯中的順序隱含巢狀項目。Elements must be implicitly nested in order for the corresponding DataTables to participate in a nested relation. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式建立新，並將寫入至該資料表的結構描述。The following console application creates a new , and writes the schema for that table to a . 然後，此範例會建立新並讀取其結構描述從已儲存的 XML 結構描述。Then, the example creates a new and reads its schema from the saved XML schema. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法建立的結構描述。Use the method to create the schema for a . 結構描述包含資料表、 關聯和條件約束的定義。The schema includes table, relation, and constraint definitions. 若要寫入的 XML 文件結構描述，請使用方法。To write a schema to an XML document, use the method. XML 結構描述會根據標準的 XSD 進行解譯。The XML schema is interpreted according to the XSD standard. 如果 msdata:DataType 和 xs: type 類型不相符，就會發生資料損毀。Data corruption can occur if the msdata:DataType and the xs:type types do not match. 將會擲不回任何例外狀況。No exception will be thrown. `ReadXmlSchema`方法一般叫用之前叫用方法用來填滿`DataTable`。The `ReadXmlSchema` method is generally invoked before invoking the method which is used to fill the `DataTable`. 若要建立巢狀的關聯使用 XML 結構描述，請使用隱含的巢狀項目。To create a nested relation using XML schema, use implicit nested elements. 您也可以重新設定以使用明確的資料行名稱的巢狀關聯性。You can also reconfigure the nested relation to use explicit column names. 必須在對應的 Datatable 加入巢狀關聯中的順序隱含巢狀項目。Elements must be implicitly nested in order for the corresponding DataTables to participate in a nested relation. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式建立新，並將該資料表的結構描述寫入檔案。The following console application creates a new , and writes the schema for that table to a file. 然後，此範例會建立新及讀取其結構描述從已儲存的 XML 結構描述，使用當做其來源檔案。Then, the example creates a new and reads its schema from the saved XML schema, using the file as its source. XML 結構描述會根據標準的 XSD 進行解譯。The XML schema is interpreted according to the XSD standard. 如果 msdata:DataType 和 xs: type 類型不相符，就會發生資料損毀。Data corruption can occur if the msdata:DataType and the xs:type types do not match. 將會擲不回任何例外狀況。No exception will be thrown. `ReadXmlSchema`方法一般叫用之前叫用方法用來填滿。The `ReadXmlSchema` method is generally invoked before invoking the method which is used to fill the . > [!NOTE] > 建立使用 XML 結構描述的巢狀的關聯的方式是將隱含的巢狀項目。The way to create a nested relation using XML schema is to have implicit nested elements. 此外，巢狀的關聯可以重新建立，以使用明確的資料行名稱。Additionally, the nested relation could be re-wired, to use explicit column names. 它會隱含地在巢狀關聯中加入對應的 Datatable 的巢狀項目強制的。It is mandatory for elements to be implicitly nested for the corresponding DataTables to participate in a nested relation. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式建立新，並將寫入至該資料表的結構描述。The following console application creates a new , and writes the schema for that table to a . 然後，此範例會建立新及讀取其結構描述從已儲存的 XML 結構描述，使用(繼承自) 當做其來源。Then, the example creates a new and reads its schema from the saved XML schema, using a (which inherits from ) as its source. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供說明如何撰寫，不論是資料或資料和結構描述從XML 文件，而方法會寫入的結構描述。The method provides a way to write either data only, or both data and schema from a into an XML document, whereas the method writes only the schema. 寫入資料和結構描述，請使用其中一個多載，包括參數，並將其值設定為`WriteSchema`。To write both data and schema, use one of the overloads that include the parameter, and set its value to `WriteSchema`. 請注意，也適用於和方法，分別。Note that the same is true for the and methods, respectively. 讀取 XML 資料，或結構描述和資料`DataTable`，使用`ReadXml`方法。To read XML data, or both schema and data into the `DataTable`, use the `ReadXml` method. 若要讀取的結構描述，使用`ReadXmlSchema`方法。To read just the schema, use the `ReadXmlSchema` method. > [!NOTE] > 會擲回的資料行類型`DataRow`正在讀取或寫入實作，但未實作。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement . ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式會建立兩個執行個體時，會新增至每個，建立相關的兩個資料表，然後再使用方法寫入父資料表內所包含的資料.The following console application creates two instances, adds each to a , creates a relating the two tables, and then uses the method to write the data contained within the parent table to a . 設定時，此範例會示範此行為`writeHierarchy`其值的每個參數。The example demonstrates the behavior when setting the `writeHierarchy` parameter to each of its values. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例示範如何使用其中一種 WriteXml 多載版本。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of WriteXml. 如需可能會提供其他範例，請參閱個別的多載的主題。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlOverload/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlOverload/VB/source.vb#1)] 此範例會在主控台視窗中顯示以下輸出：The example displays the following output in the console window: ``` ============================== Customer table, without hierarchy ============================== 1 Mary 2 Andy 3 Peter 4 Russ ============================== Customer table, with hierarchy ============================== 1 Mary 2 Andy 3 Peter 4 Russ 1 1 2003-12-02T00:00:00.0000000-08:00 2 1 2004-01-03T00:00:00.0000000-08:00 3 2 2004-11-13T00:00:00.0000000-08:00 4 3 2004-05-16T00:00:00.0000000-07:00 5 3 2004-05-22T00:00:00.0000000-07:00 6 4 2004-06-15T00:00:00.0000000-07:00 ```

Examples 下列主控台應用程式會建立兩個執行個體時，會新增至每個，建立相關的兩個資料表，然後再使用方法寫入父資料表內所包含的資料.The following console application creates two instances, adds each to a , creates a relating the two tables, and then uses the method to write the data contained within the parent table to a . 設定時，此範例會示範此行為`writeHierarchy`其值的每個參數。The example demonstrates the behavior when setting the `writeHierarchy` parameter to each of its values. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlIO#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlIO/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlIO#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlIO/VB/source.vb#1)] 此範例會在主控台視窗中顯示以下輸出：The example displays the following output in the console window: ``` ============================== Customer table, without hierarchy ============================== 1 Mary 2 Andy 3 Peter 4 Russ ============================== Customer table, with hierarchy ============================== 1 Mary 2 Andy 3 Peter 4 Russ 1 1 2003-12-02T00:00:00.0000000-08:00 2 1 2004-01-03T00:00:00.0000000-08:00 3 2 2004-11-13T00:00:00.0000000-08:00 4 3 2004-05-16T00:00:00.0000000-07:00 5 3 2004-05-22T00:00:00.0000000-07:00 6 4 2004-06-15T00:00:00.0000000-07:00 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供說明如何撰寫，不論是資料或資料和結構描述從XML 文件，而方法會寫入的結構描述。The method provides a way to write either data only, or both data and schema from a into an XML document, whereas the method writes only the schema. 寫入資料和結構描述，請使用其中一個多載，包括參數，並將其值設定為`WriteSchema`。To write both data and schema, use one of the overloads that include the parameter, and set its value to `WriteSchema`. 請注意，也適用於和方法，分別。Note that the same is true for the and methods, respectively. 讀取 XML 資料，或結構描述和資料`DataTable`，使用`ReadXml`方法。To read XML data, or both schema and data into the `DataTable`, use the `ReadXml` method. 若要讀取的結構描述，使用`ReadXmlSchema`方法。To read just the schema, use the `ReadXmlSchema` method. 通常`WriteXml`方法將僅針對目前資料表的資料。Normally the `WriteXml` method writes the data only for the current table. 若要寫入目前的資料表和整個子系、 相關資料表的資料，使用呼叫方法`writeHierarchy`參數設定為`true`。To write the data for the current table and its entire descendant, related tables, call the method with the `writeHierarchy` parameter set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 會擲回的資料行類型`DataRow`正在讀取或寫入實作，但未實作。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement .

summary.span: 將 目前的資料結構撰寫成 XML 結構描述。

span.span: Writes the current data structure of the as an XML schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來寫入的結構描述XML 文件。Use the method to write the schema for a to an XML document. 結構描述包含資料表、 關聯和條件約束的定義。The schema includes table, relation, and constraint definitions. 使用 XSD 標準寫入 XML 結構描述。The XML schema is written using the XSD standard. 若要將資料寫入 XML 文件中，使用方法。To write the data to an XML document, use the method. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式會建立兩個執行個體時，會新增至每個，建立相關的兩個資料表，然後再使用方法寫入父資料表內所包含的資料.The following console application creates two instances, adds each to a , creates a relating the two tables, and then uses the method to write the data contained within the parent table to a . 設定時，此範例會示範此行為`writeHierarchy`其值的每個參數。The example demonstrates the behavior when setting the `writeHierarchy` parameter to each of its values. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例示範如何使用其中一個多載版本`WriteXmlSchema`如，可能會有其他範例，請參閱個別的多載的主題。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of `WriteXmlSchema` For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlSchemaOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlSchemaOverload/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlSchemaOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlSchemaOverload/VB/source.vb#1)] 此範例會在主控台視窗中顯示以下輸出：The example displays the following output in the console window: ``` ============================== Customer table, without hierarchy ============================== ============================== Customer table, with hierarchy ============================== ```
